titles.title: Alien Smuggling Act of 1994
A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to strengthen the criminal offenses and penalties for the smuggling of aliens.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S7581)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

bill.summary: 6/23/1994--Introduced. Alien Smuggling Act of 1994 - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to increase criminal penalties for alien smuggling.
